item.description:
I'm inviting you to a community event for DESIGN (graphic and associated industries) and/or those who just love design or rubbing shoulders with creatives. I'm the lead organizer of this event for AIGA RI and am promoting this through various avenues. Anyone is welcome - venue fits a little over 200 and would be cool to fill the space.

20|10 reflect|respond|revolutionize | DESIGN
Friday 1/22/2010
5 - 8pm
Michael P. Metcalf Auditorium
Chace Center of RISD
20 North Main Street
FREE

Out with the old, in with the new… decade!
Are you optimistic or pessimistic about the state of design? This FREE event welcomes all in the various creative industries in and around Providence to take a moment of reflection or prediction, celebration or revolution.
20 local creatives will be speaking their minds for 60 seconds each, immediately followed by a special 10-minute keynote. Visit ri.aiga.org for an updated list prior to the evening revelry.

5 – 6:15 reception
6:15 – 7 celebration
7 – 8 post-revelry conversations, raffle of design swag (posters, t-shirts, books) + open mike opportunity
after 8 gather up some new friends for dinner on the town or join AIGA-ers for an after-party TBD.

Get more information as it becomes available at http://ri.aiga.org...
or visit the facebook event page at AIGA, RI | The Professional Association for Design
item.name: 20|10 DESIGN community event
